name: 2010 - A short horror game
description:
Epilepsy warning!

Multiple people have died to a dangerous computer virus, nobody knows what is the cause of it.

                  Today, you have been sent by the police to re-investigate a computer that belonged to a lady before she also, mysteriously passed away. Very weird sounds have been heard coming from her Computer. Police already investigated it, but didn't find anything. But. as more reports have been coming in with more people passing away, you've been assigned with a simple mission: 

Find the virus that is causing all of this chaos.

Similar games that I made about odd computer related mysteries: https://ioquack.itch.io/1980-full

I appreciate you playing my game! Sharing this game with other people would help me out, a LOT!
